RIGHT는 R에서 지원하는 base그래픽의 문법에 기초하여 만들어졌습니다.
따라서 RIGHT를 처음 접해보는 유저들도 아주 간편하게 사용할 수 있습니다.
R에서 지원하는 그래프 문법에 RIGHT() 감싸주기만 하면 됩니다.

== Scatter plot == 
 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scatter_plot Scatter plot], display values for two variables for a set of data.
 * Regression (linear, loess) is enabled. The calculation for a regression line is done by the server side with R. (Shiny library is used here)
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/scatter_diamonds.PNG">

To run the example type:

{{{
> RIGHT(plot(price~carat, diamonds, type="p"), diamonds, dir = "TEST")
}}}


== Bar plot == 
 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bar_chart Bar plot], rectangular bars with lengths proportional to the values.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/bar_diamonds.PNG">

To run the example type:

{{{
> RIGHT(hist(price, diamonds), diamonds, dir = "TEST")
}}}

== Line plot == 
 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Line_chart Line plot], displays information as a series of data points connected by straight line segments.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/line_diamonds.PNG">

To run the example type:

{{{
> RIGHT(plot(price~carat, diamonds, type="l"), diamonds, dir = "TEST")
}}}

== Pie chart == 
 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pie_chart Pie chart], circular chart divided into sectors, illustrating numerical proportion.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/pie_diamonds.PNG">

To run the example type:

{{{
> RIGHT(pie(color, diamonds), diamonds, dir = "TEST")
}}}
